snippet: Newt Gingrich set up his speaking and consulting business as an S corporation, which exempted this portion of his income from Medicare taxes, an unusual move for a business based on services.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column observes Newt Gingrich set up his speaking and consulting business as an S corporation, which exempted this portion of his income from Medicare taxes, an unusual move for a business based on services; discusses considerations for entrepreneurs and small-businesses in setting up S corporations.
lead_paragraph: Newt Gingrich set up his speaking and consulting business as an S corporation, which exempted this portion of his income from Medicare taxes, an unusual move for a business based on services.

headline.print_headline: The Advantages and Risks of Gingrich’s Tax Strategy
headline.seo: Advantages and Risks of Gingrich’s S Corporation
headline.main: The Advantages and Risks of Gingrich’s Tax Strategy
